}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:47.840
    | text      = I've not cut anything out of the special report that Alex is playing, except for one point where he plays the audio of the bomb going off in Nashville.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:08:56.840
    | text      = It doesn't really add anything interesting to the episode to hear an explosion, and the audio mix is terrible, it is so loud.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:02.840
    | text      = It would just blow out people's ears.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:04.840
    | text      = It does make me think of that Bill Cooper episode, though, the day after the Oklahoma City bombing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:09.840
    | text      = In that episode, Bill made a point to play the audio of the explosion, and there's kind of echoes here,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:14.840
    | text      = except for Bill was doing it dramatically.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:17.840
    | text      = Bill played it repeatedly, and kind of almost like a chorus, and then he would say something in the middle.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:24.840
    | text      = It was a call and response to the bomb.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:27.840
    | text      = Alex just plays it, and it's very loud.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:30.840
    | text      = All I've done here is I've just cut every time it's clear that Alex is doing a different take.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:35.840
    | text      = Because, you know, the audio shifts slightly, and you can tell that Alex just ran out of steam, and they're like,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:40.840
    | text      = So he did a couple of takes? Well, that's better than we've seen in the past.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:45.840
    | text      = True, true. Let's do another sentence. Try another sentence, Alex.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:49.840
    | text      = Yeah, try it one more time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:50.840
    | text      = I get the sense he was recording from home, so maybe his wife is a better producer than Rob Dew.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:56.840
    | text      = You can't say that!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:58.840
    | text      = Oh, God damn it, honey.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:00.840
    | text      = So here's where we start. Here's the beginning.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:03.840
    | text      = Today, in the early morning hours of Christmas, a large truck bomb housed inside an RV
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:10.840
    | text      = exploded outside the AT&T main communications building in Nashville.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:14.840
    | text      = The individual, organization, or group behind the attack went out of their way
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:19.840
    | text      = to warn the public to get away before the bomb detonated by broadcasting for more than ten minutes
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:24.840
    | text      = that there was a bomb on board the vehicle that was about to detonate.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:27.840
    | text      = 911 also received a call claiming that gunshots had been fired in the area minutes before the explosion.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:33.840
    | text      = The FBI is now reporting that human remains have been found in the debris at the blast site.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:37.840
    | text      = So you can already tell those are multiple takes?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:40.840
    | text      = Yeah, the 911 cut was almost Paul Joseph Watson-esque, of coming in before the breath is finished.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:49.840
    | text      = The hole was cut in the middle of a sentence, though.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:52.840
    | text      = Yeah, so infuriating. I hate it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:54.840
    | text      = So on Christmas Day, in case people did not hear about this,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:57.840
    | text      = a bomb was detonated in an RV parked in downtown Nashville.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:01.840
    | text      = At the time of our recording, one of the working theories that people have
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:04.840
    | text      = is that it's possible that the person was targeting the AT&T building,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:07.840
    | text      = which was quite nearby the blast site.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:10.840
    | text      = This, as a possible motive for an act of domestic terror, makes complete sense.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:15.840
    | text      = If you were going to go through the trouble of carrying out a bombing,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:17.840
    | text      = you would likely want whatever damage you do to have maximum impact.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:21.840
    | text      = AT&T's operations in Nashville are housed at that building,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:24.840
    | text      = so the potential disruption you could cause by damaging that would be huge,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:27.840
    | text      = as we've seen from the fallout of the bombing itself,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:30.840
    | text      = with some people still being without phone service today as we're recording.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:34.840
    | text      = This is all a very tragic turn of events,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:36.840
    | text      = and my heart goes out to the people affected by this act.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:39.840
    | text      = Thankfully, there weren't any civilian casualties,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:42.840
    | text      = and the human remains that were found there,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:44.840
    | text      = literally right before we started recording,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:46.840
    | text      = I saw it was being reported that they have matched the DNA
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:49.840
    | text      = to the person they suspect is the bomber.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:52.840
    | text      = There's a lot of stuff that's on my own still about this event,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:54.840
    | text      = but there are definitely some fair assumptions you can make about it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:57.840
    | text      = Obviously, this wasn't an accident, so there was an intention behind this bombing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:02.840
    | text      = It was clearly meant to be a spectacle and something that would be traumatic,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:05.840
    | text      = given that it was planned for Christmas morning,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:07.840
    | text      = which is a very solemn time for many in this country.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:10.840
    | text      = My gut tells me, based on these pieces of information,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:13.840
    | text      = that this was an ideological act.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:15.840
    | text      = But who knows what that ideology is at this point?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:19.840
    | text      = Right. I mean, it's unfortunate that the vibe I'm getting from this whole thing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:25.840
    | text      = is Vietnamese monks self-immolating,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:29.840
    | text      = but because they believe that the Laotians are going to sneak in through the earth,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:36.840
    | text      = where it's like, yes, you are making a statement.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:40.840
    | text      = This is a problem, though. This is an issue.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:43.840
    | text      = I'm not sure I quite follow what you're saying.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:45.840
    | text      = 5G isn't going to hurt anyone. Do you know what I'm saying?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:47.840
    | text      = Well, but I don't know if that's the motivation either.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:49.840
    | text      = No, no, no, totally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:50.840
    | text      = That's making an assumption there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:52.840
    | text      = No, of course. That's why I said the vibe I'm getting,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:54.840
    | text      = not like, I know for a fact that this is why you did that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:57.840
    | text      = But that's the general feeling that people are passing around.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:02.840
    | text      = Some people are speculating on that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:04.840
    | text      = What I'm trying to clearly delineate here is the idea of what is responsible speculation and what is not.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:12.840
    | text      = Oh, totally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:13.840
    | text      = Speculating that this was motivated by some sort of an ideology
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:16.840
    | text      = based on the actions, the circumstances, responsible speculation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:21.840
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:22.840
    | text      = Claiming that you know exactly what it is or choosing what you want the target you think it might have been.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:29.840
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:30.840
    | text      = And then why would they do that?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:31.840
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:32.840
    | text      = That's not great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:33.840
    | text      = No, totally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:34.840
    | text      = That's not grounded.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:35.840
    | text      = And I think that, you know, I see that possibility.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:40.840
    | text      = Yeah, sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:41.840
    | text      = It could turn out that more information comes out and he was someone who was worried about 5G.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:45.840
    | text      = Yeah, no, I don't know by any stretch.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:48.840
    | text      = And nor am I making a claim that that's what's going on by any means.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:54.840
    | text      = But from what I understand so far, it does have that feeling of somebody who is,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:02.840
    | text      = I guess, sacrificing their own life for something they believe in.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:05.840
    | text      = And chances are, if you're going after AT&T.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:10.840
    | text      = And if you unpack that a little bit more, you're still making a giant assumption.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:13.840
    | text      = Oh no, I'm making a massive assumption.
